name: The Purple Wizard
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

The theme of the jam was "Roll of the Dice", in this game when you roll the dice you get an ability. Use WASD to move, F to roll the die. Click to shoot.

Everything is purple because I created a few sprites and decided "why not make everything purple"

Thanks for playing :)
